thread.title: Shop Winter Ski Sale at Unclaimed Baggage Center and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro
thread.title_full: Shop Winter Ski Sale at Unclaimed Baggage Center and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Shop Winter Ski Sale at Unclaimed Baggage Center and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro, AL offers convenient lodging for guests shopping the annual Winter Ski Sale at Unclaimed Baggage Center on November 7, 2015.
 SCOTTSBORO, AL, October 23, Bargain hunters shopping the 34th Annual Winter Ski Sale at Unclaimed Baggage Center can enjoy convenient lodging at the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro AL hotel . The event takes place on November 7 and is one of the biggest sales of the year at Unclaimed Baggage Center. Shoppers will find designer outerwear, ski equipment, and winter accessories in a variety of name brands including North Face, Rossignol, and Patagonia.
"We look forward to welcoming guests shopping at Unclaimed Baggage," shares Debra Luke, General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro. "Our special Shop and Drop Package includes a 25% off coupon at Unclaimed Baggage as well as a $25 gift certificate for lunch at McCutchen's Magnolia House in Scottsboro," continues Ms. Luke.
This hotel near downtown Scottsboro features non-smoking rooms with free high speed Internet and Clean and Fresh Hampton Beds . Guests will appreciate the convenience of an in-room microwave, mini refrigerator, and coffee maker. King studio suites offer additional space. Freshly baked cookies are available at check in, or guests can purchase a snack in the Pavilion Pantry Market in the lobby. Hampton's complimentary On the House Breakfast is a delicious way to start the day. On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick option on weekday mornings. Hotel amenities include a 24-hour business center, fitness room, and boat trailer parking with charging stations. This award winning property is close to Lake Guntersville, Goose Pond Colony, and Hampton Cove Golf Course on Alabama's Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail.
Guests who are booking the Shop & Drop Package should call the hotel directly and ask for rate code 'SAD'. AAA and senior discounts are available. HHonors members can earn double points with the 2X Points Package.
For more information about Unclaimed Baggage Center, visit www.unclaimedbaggage.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama hotel , call (256)259-5200 or visit www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com .
About Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama Hotel
The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro hotel in Alabama is located in the mountain/lakes region of northern Alabama surrounded by majestic mountains and rich valleys, located minutes from Lake Guntersville. Whether in town for business or pleasure, Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro has been designed with your comfort in mind, from boat parking to complimentary high-speed Internet access; your comfort is their main goal. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms and suites features the Clean & Fresh Hampton bed, mini refrigerator, microwave, work desk, basic cable plus HBO, and 37 inch flat panel TV.
For more information visit: http://www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
